title: Interpretation of jasmine in a dream and jasmine and roses in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a jasmine flower and jasmine for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man if a bouquet of roses, decades of white jasmine, picking, buying, smelling, perfume by Ibn Sirin and others. Jasmine in a dream is a praiseworthy dream, and it is often like other roses in a dream. But in some dreams, it is an unpleasant vision because the vision differs from one person to another and varies from one place to another. Interpretation of pepper in a dream: Roses generally indicate an honorable man and indicate the return of the absent person. As for the falling of rose leaves, it shows intense sadness. Are you sad about something? Regarding the type of rose. There is only one if the red rose shows a woman who is not interested in religious matters. And the white rose indicates a sincere woman, that is, close to God. Linen is made of white roses, which is, as I told you, your righteous religion. Interpretation of a dream about jasmine for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is passing through a garden full of jasmine It is colorful and has a special smell, so this is evidence that she will soon hear happy and good news, God willing. Love is here, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about jasmine for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is planting jasmine above her house, this is evidence of the extent of her husband’s love for her and the stability in which this woman lives. Interpretation of jasmine in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is buying jasmine It has a fragrant and beautiful smell, so this is evidence that childbirth is easy and affordable and that this woman will give birth to a male child. Best.Interpretation of jasmine in a dream for a divorced womanIf a divorced woman sees a lot of jasmine on the road in her dream, this is evidence that the situation will soon change for the better for this woman.Interpretation of jasmine in a dream for a manIf a man dreams that he is selling jasmine in a store and people agree to buy from him, this is a sign of... Kindness and livelihood are coming soon to this man, and the dream is that he is walking in a garden full of jasmine and its scent. Fragrant and typical. This is evidence of the fulfillment of his desire for a while, and God knows best. Interpretation of YouTuber: The Elephant

Interpretation of Dreams Seeing a crocodile in a dream in its entirety Seeing horses in a dream in its entirety is one of the visions that was said to testify to the dreamer’s kindness, presence, and getting Money. Seeing horses full in a dream means that in the next life the dreamer will proceed with an important matter and succeed in it. Also, seeing a sick person in a dream full indicates a quick recovery from the disease and an improvement in conditions in general. Also, seeing horses in a dream full is a sign of Happy events await the dreamer in his life. Seeing complete hatred in a dream means freedom from worries and problems, and the dreamer will emerge from his sadness. After the visions, it was stated that the dreamer eating horses indicates that he is eating the orphan’s money and kidnapping the needy. Why do you dream of cleaning cards? The interpretation of seeing complete tension in The dream is evidence that the dreamer will soon change a lot for the better in his life. The dreamer who sees himself cleaning his thighs in a state of extreme despair is good news from God that he will emerge from his sadness. Also, seeing horses in a dream whole and clean is a sign of the dreamer’s closeness to God and the purity of his intentions. From all evil. Why dream of making a whole baro in a dream? Seeing how horses are cooked and prepared in a whole dream means that the dreamer will enter a new phase in his life. Seeing horses in a dream indicates good and abundant food that the dreamer will enjoy in the near future. In addition, seeing Cooked bacon in a person’s dream is considered good news that he will have a good wife who will make his life happy for him. What is the dream of a cow being run over? Seeing a cow running in a dream means wealth and song that the dreamer will gain in the next life. In the same way, seeing cows in a dream around a track is one of Good dreams that mean money, food, and blessings for the dreamer. Seeing horses in a lonely woman’s dream: It is desirable for a lonely woman in a dream to eat the whole dome, and it is desirable to see the legs and intestines of sheep, and this means money and honor. Also, seeing a naked woman in a dream is a sign of an imminent marriage with a man. Wealthy and fit. Also, seeing unmarried women in a complete dream means achieving goals and desires and satisfying their desires. Eating trotters in a dream about pregnancy. Seeing running in a dream for a pregnant woman as a whole indicates an improvement in her condition and her coming out of a state of exhaustion. Also, seeing a pregnant woman in a dream full of raw food means An easy birth without problems and difficulties. title: The symbol of all in Ibn Sirin’s dream

preview.html: Kohl in a dream Liquid or powdered kohl is used in kohl and has many colors for women to choose what suits them and men wear it, but rarely... a man or a woman and other symbols that we will explain in detail in the following lines of the article. Kohl in a dream There are many indications provided by interpretive scholars for seeing kohl in a dream, The most important of them can be explained through the following: Whoever sees eyeliner in a dream, this is a sign of the abundance of sustenance and the abundance of goodness that will soon reach him. If someone is going through difficult circumstances in this period of his life and dreams of eyeliner, then this symbolizes the positive changes that he will witness in the coming days. And his ability to deal with the problems and difficulties that he faces in his life. If a person commits sins and disobedience in his life and sees Cole during his sleep, this is a sign of repentance, closeness to God, and avoiding the path of misguidance. All in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - mentioned many interpretations. For kohl in a dream, the most prominent of which are the following: Seeing kohl in a dream expresses the good luck that will accompany the dreamer in the next period of his life. If a student of knowledge sees kohl during sleep, this is evidence of his success in his studies, his superiority over his peers, and his family’s pride in him. If a person is suffering from distress in reality and dreams of eyeliner, this is a sign that he has earned a lot of money that improves his living conditions and gives him a feeling of happiness and peace of mind. What is the interpretation of eyeliner in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq? Imam Al-Sadiq says that seeing eyeliner in a dream is a sign of recovery from Sickness and recovery. Whoever buys kohl from the market while he is asleep, this will lead to the death of the worries and anxieties in his chest. Seeing a kohl pencil while sleeping symbolizes many good things that will come to the viewer in the coming period. As for the dream of eating kohl, it portends affliction, illness, anxiety, and distress. Kohl in a single woman’s dream. Learn with us about the different clues that commentators said about seeing kohl in a single woman’s dream: Seeing Kohl during sleep for unmarried women symbolizes that they are surrounded by close friends who observe the teachings of their religion, perform acts of worship, and perform the duties required of them. And if the girl suffers from unhappiness And the need in her life and dreams for kohl, then this is a sign that the distress will go away, joy will replace sadness, and her financial circumstances and social status will change. In the event that the girl is ambitious and seeks to achieve many desires and goals and she sees kohl in a dream, this is a sign that God Almighty will achieve what she desires. Kohl in a dream for a married woman. Seeing Kohl in a dream for a married woman indicates the state of stability and happiness that she lives within the limits of her partner and the extent of love, tenderness, respect, appreciation and understanding between them. If a woman wants to replace and dreams of kohl, this is evidence that God Almighty will carry her soon. If the married woman works as an employee And she dreams of coquetry, this proves that she has obtained a distinguished promotion and a prominent position at work. In the event that a married woman is afflicted with an illness and

title: Interpretation of a dream about my friend’s father in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about my friend’s father in a dream Seeing a friend can express different meanings, and below we present the interpretation of a dream about my friend’s father in a dream and other details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream about my friend’s father in a dream Interpretation of a dream about my friend’s father in a dream Seeing a friend’s father can indicate kindness, and God knows best, where If the dreamer sees his friend’s father happy in a dream, it may express happiness, and God knows the unseen. In the event that the dreamer sees his friend’s father sad, this may lead to undesirable things, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, as it may indicate worry, and God knows all that is unseen. The interpretation of a dream about my friend’s brother being engaged to me was In a dream, interpretation of dreams about my friend’s brother marrying me in a dream. Seeing your friend’s brother’s brother may indicate changes, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing the participation of people he knows can indicate good news, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, as he may express what you receive of news that makes you happy, and God knows everything that is not seen. If an unmarried girl sees her engagement to her teacher It may express her superiority, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my friend’s son in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my friend’s son in a dream. Perhaps seeing the birth of my friend means getting rid of sadness, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees the birth of her friend, it may mean that she will get rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. When I see My friend gives birth to a boy in a dream, it could be a sign of money, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees the birth of her friend’s son, this may indicate inheritance, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about my mother with a child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother with a child in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing a child Carrying a child in a dream could be a sign that you are getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself carrying a child in a dream, this may be a sign that he is relieved of sadness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a child laughing in a dream, this is good, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a child He calls his mother in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of a child calling his mother in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing a child calling my name in a dream could be a sign of taking responsibility, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a child calling his name, this may indicate that he is responsible and that God knows the unseen. When An unmarried girl sees a child calling her name in a dream. This could be evidence that she bears responsibility despite advanced age, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a child in an embrace in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a child in an embrace in a dream can lead to goodness, and God knows all that is. InvisibleIf the dreamer sees a child in his arms in a dream, marriage may be for the single person, and God knows best. When she sees a child in an embrace in a dream, this may be a sign of the money he obtains, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees a child in an embrace in a dream, this can lead to marriage. God willing.Interpretation of a dream about my friend dying in an accident in a dream. title: Interpretation of seeing wearing long clothes in a dream

preview.html: It also indicates the dreamer’s relationship with God Almighty, and the interpretation of a dream about wearing a long dress varies in terms of its beauty or ugliness. It also varies depending on whether the dreamer is a man, single, married, or pregnant. We will discuss the interpretation of this vision in detail as follows: Interpretation of wearing long clothes by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that when a person sees in his dream that he is wearing long, beautiful, good-looking clothes, this is an indication of the approaching date of the dream’s relationship, whether it is a wedding or an engagement. The interpretation of seeing long clothes varies. In a dream, it depends on whether it is new or old. If it is new, this is a sign that the dreamer will fall in love. If the clothes are clean, then they indicate happiness, joy, health, and safety from all harm. If they are old, then their connotations are bad, not good, because they indicate distress and anxiety. And anxiety and poor financial conditions, and God knows best. Interpretation of wearing long clothes for a single woman: When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing long clothes, the sign is better for her, especially if she is wearing white clothes, as it indicates the date of her approaching engagement, whether it is a wedding or an engagement. It could be a sign On a promotion at work or academic life, and if the long clothes are a gift from someone, this is an indication that there is a connection between the dreamer and the person who gave her those long clothes, whether that connection is one. Love or friendship. And if she dies, this is a sign of goodness and improvement in her financial and academic conditions, and God knows best. Interpretation of wearing long clothes for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing long, new clothes, this is evidence of kindness, spaciousness of life, and improvement of her family’s circumstances, as her relationship with her husband and children will be good and in good health. good case. She also announces the good morals of her children, an indication that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. Interpretation of wearing long clothes for a pregnant woman When a pregnant woman sees that she is wearing long clothes, the sign of this dream is good, and shows joy, optimism, and pleasure, and long clothes also indicate the health and safety of the fetus and its safety after birth. It may The clothes indicate the type of fetus that the woman will give birth to in the dream. But if the long clothes are a gift that someone bought for her, then this is evidence that the baby will be a female, and God knows best. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible. .
preview.text: It also indicates the dreamer’s relationship with God Almighty, and the interpretation of a dream about wearing a long dress varies in terms of its beauty or ugliness. It also varies depending on whether the dreamer is a man, single, married, or pregnant. We will discuss the interpretation of this vision in detail as follows: Interpretation of wearing long clothes by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that when a person sees in his dream that he is wearing long, beautiful, good-looking clothes, this is an indication of the approaching date of the dream’s relationship, whether it is a wedding or an engagement. The interpretation of seeing long clothes varies. In a dream, it depends on whether it is new or old. If it is new, this is a sign that the dreamer will fall in love. If the clothes are clean, then they indicate happiness, joy, health, and safety from all harm. If they are old, then their connotations are bad, not good, because they indicate distress and anxiety. And anxiety and poor financial conditions, and God knows best. Interpretation of wearing long clothes for a single woman: When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing long clothes, the sign is better for her, especially if she is wearing white clothes, as it indicates the date of her approaching engagement, whether it is a wedding or an engagement. It could be a sign On a promotion at work or academic life, and if the long clothes are a gift from someone, this is an indication that there is a connection between the dreamer and the person who gave her those long clothes, whether that connection is one. Love or friendship. And if she dies, this is a sign of goodness and improvement in her financial and academic conditions, and God knows best. Interpretation of wearing long clothes for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing long, new clothes, this is evidence of kindness, spaciousness of life, and improvement of her family’s circumstances, as her relationship with her husband and children will be good and in good health. good case. She also announces the good morals of her children, an indication that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. Interpretation of wearing long clothes for a pregnant woman When a pregnant woman sees that she is wearing long clothes, the sign of this dream is good, and shows joy, optimism, and pleasure, and long clothes also indicate the health and safety of the fetus and its safety after birth. It may The clothes indicate the type of fetus that the woman will give birth to in the dream. But if the long clothes are a gift that someone bought for her, then this is evidence that the baby will be a female, and God knows best. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible. .

title: Interpretation of an unmarried woman’s dream that she is pregnant according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a single man’s dream that he is pregnant in a dream can indicate many different meanings and meanings depending on her condition within the dream and its path, and in general the interpretations range between sad and negative and unhappy and positive and happy and cheerful. Interpretation of a single man’s dream that he is pregnant. A virgin’s dream that she is pregnant in a dream is evidence of many gains. Which she will gain in the near future and nutrition with many benefits that will help her enjoy the happy and stable life that she desires. Pregnancy in an unmarried girl’s dream in general is a sign of joy and happiness and getting rid of all the obstacles and problems that stood in her way in the past period and prevented her from continuing to strive and get closer to Its goals. Al-Nabulsi interprets the dream of pregnancy in a dream for an unmarried woman as evidence of long-term sadness and unhappiness and the inability to succeed, advance, and survive for a long time without the presence of honorable people by her side to help and support her. Interpretation of the dream of an unmarried woman being pregnant with Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the pregnancy of an unmarried girl in a dream As evidence that she will hear some good news in the near future and get rid of the negative feelings that affected her in the past and left her in a state of isolation and loneliness. The dream of pregnancy and childbirth in a girl’s dream indicates that she will find a new job that will bring an appropriate financial gain that will help her provide a stable life without problems. And debts form a heavy burden on her heart. The dream of pregnancy in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates marriage in the near future to a man who has good qualities and morals who treats her with affection and tenderness and takes into consideration God Almighty and that their future life will be very happy. I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I was alone with a small stomach. Seeing a pregnant girl In a dream, but her belly is small, this indicates the strong personality that distinguishes her in reality. She bears many responsibilities and that she is a good girl who can be relied upon to solve problems and get out of adversity. A dream about pregnancy and a small unmarried woman’s belly in a dream may indicate that a person close to her is involved in a traffic accident and needs a period to recover and be able to live life again, and this is a great sadness in the dreamer’s life. Many scholars interpret an unmarried girl’s dream of being pregnant and her belly is not visible. For the good qualities that distinguish her and her love for everyone and her ability to help solve problems and adversities easily. I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I was alone and my stomach was big. The single girl’s pregnancy and her stomach grew noticeably, a sign of the end of the difficult period in which she suffered many problems and difficulties and she is trying to start her life again and work on Achieving goals and reaching a great position. Seeing a pregnant girl alone in the last months before giving birth is evidence of the new job opportunity that has been made available to her, in which she is trying to prove herself so that she can be promoted and reach a large and important position in her professional life. A dream for an unmarried woman with a large belly indicates Continuous effort and working with all her energy and effort so that she can achieve her goals and not give in to obstacles

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding in a church in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a wedding in a church in a dream: We may see some incomprehensible dreams, so we present in the following lines whether they are good or bad, according to the interpretations of scholars and translators and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a wedding in a church in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about getting married in a church in a dream can be A sign of stability and stability, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a wedding in a church in a dream can indicate stability, and God knows best. If a married man sees a wedding in a church, this may indicate a promotion at work, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a wedding in a church in a dream, it may represent that A promotion at work, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an in a church in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an in a church in a dream can indicate victory over enemies, and God knows the unseen. If a young man dreams of reading the Qur’an in a church, this may indicate that he will be able to defeat his enemies, and God knows the unseen. I know the unseen. When you see an unmarried girl reading the Qur’an in the church, this may indicate her victory over her enemies, and God knows the unseen. If a married man is seen reading the Qur’an in the church, this may indicate victory over his enemies, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of a burning church in a dream. The interpretation of the dream may indicate A burning church in a dream indicates family or social disputes, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees a church burning, this may indicate the differences she faces socially or family, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees in his dream that he falls from a church while it is burning, this may indicate a material loss or He is exposed to losses, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of listening to church hymns in a dream. The interpretation of a dream of listening to church hymns in a dream may reflect average rates at work, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer hears church hymns in a dream, this may indicate concealment at home, and God knows the unseen. When seeing a single girl, hearing church hymns may indicate the presence of a sweater in the house and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about sweeping a church in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about sweeping a church in a dream. Cleaning the church can lead to good things, and God knows what is not seen. If the dreamer sees himself cleaning the church in a dream, this may be evidence of his closeness to Almighty God, as he can get closer to God and do what the Lord has commanded him to do, and God knows the unseen. If a pregnant woman sees herself As she cleans the church in a dream, this could be evidence that she is close to God and is doing what God has commanded her to do, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating in church in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about eating in church in a dream can indicate non-compliance with obligations, and God knows. The unseen: In the event that the dreamer sees himself eating in the church, this may indicate the difficulties he is going through, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is eating in the church, it can express wrong decisions, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream

title: Interpretation of kidnapping in a dream by Ibn Sirin and leading jurists

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing kidnapping in a dream. The interpretation of seeing kidnapping in a dream. What did the interpreters say about the interpretation of a dream in which the dreamer was kidnapped by an unknown person, and what is the interpretation of seeing the kidnapper and hitting or harming the kidnapper? Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Kidnapping in a dream. If the dreamer lives in danger and fear of his enemies in reality and sees in a dream that he is being kidnapped and harmed, then the dream warns him of the power of these enemies and they will defeat him and defeat him easily in reality. The interpreters said that if the dreamer is kidnapped and fails to save himself from the kidnappers The vision indicates an increase in sorrows and problems in his life. If the dreamer sees a group of people kidnapping him in a dream and feels helpless and incapable of escaping from them, this indicates a failure to solve crises and face problems, and the dreamer may live periods of his life when he faces multiple losses. The dreamer who is sad in his life because of the large debts and the severity of poverty, if he saw in the dream a group of people who wanted to kidnap him, but he confronted them and escaped without being able to do so, and the scene indicates his success in earning money, improving his living conditions, and paying off the debts soon. Kidnapping in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer was kidnapped. A person in his dream is a bad person and his demonic desires and thoughts control him. If the fortuneteller kidnaps someone in a dream, he is one of those who work in suspicious businesses and take illegal money without fear of the master of servants. Ibn Sirin said that the symbol of kidnapping in a dream is interpreted as getting hurt. The dreamer is in his life by some people who betrayed him, in the event that he is the one who was kidnapped. If the dreamer is looking for safety in his life, and always feels threatened and afraid, then he dreams of being kidnapped from time to time. If the dreamer is going to enter into new social relationships while he is awake and sees that he has been He was kidnapped in a dream and the kidnappers were able to control him and he was unable to escape. The dream warns him of the social relationships he enters into with new people in his life, because they are cunning and convince him that they are trustworthy, but they are not. Seeing kidnapping may indicate that the dreamer will lose in a competition or conversation with A person, but if the dreamer was kidnapped in a dream and was able to get rid of the evil of the kidnappers. He kidnapped them and succeeded in doing so, he will be harmed by some in reality, but he will not forgive them, and he will take his rights from them in the same way that he used against him. Kidnapping in a dream for a single woman, if the dreamer is Happy and felt satisfied in her life and dreamed that she was the mother of a beautiful child and from her came an ugly woman who kidnapped the girl and did not return her, so the kidnapping here shows sadness and anguish that the viewer lives because of the woman, because as we mentioned in a large number of articles that the girl in the dream is life and happiness, especially if She looked beautiful, and kidnapping her in a dream means distress and lack of opportunities. But if an unmarried woman dreams of being kidnapped in a dream, and the kidnapper was an animal and not a human, then the vision is interpreted with certain meanings as follows: Seeing a lion kidnapping a single person: It indicates injustice and injustice that she is living in her life, Especially if you get hurt

title: The most important interpretations of seeing a married woman wearing a necklace in a dream, wearing a long earring in a dream to a married woman, and giving an earring in a dream to a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a ring in a dream for a married woman. Seeing gold and silver jewelry is one of the visions that leave a good impression on the viewer, and this vision has many connotations that vary based on many criteria, including the vision of wearing, taking off, or giving jewelry to someone or that person. Jewelry is narrow or far away, and then its meanings differ. What concerns us in this article is to mention all the details and indicators of seeing wearing a neckwear in a dream, especially for a married woman. The most important interpretations of seeing wearing a neckwear in a dream for a married woman. Wearing a necklace in a dream for a married woman. Seeing gold jewelry indicates... Wealth, great benefit and prosperity, and having a period full of rewards and profits and enjoying thought and insight that helps one know the secrets of things and their inner being. Regarding the interpretation of a dream about an earring for a married woman, it represents self-care, self-confidence, brilliance in many events, the ability to attract the attention of others and the ability to Convincing others with the ideas and visions that are in her mind. This vision also indicates assuming a prestigious position, rising to a desirable position, or having a personality that she likes for those around her, experiencing experiences that involve a kind of adventure, and gaining many gains at all levels. And if she sees that she is wearing an earring, it will cause If she sees that she is wearing a bicycle, this indicates the presence of a prison or restrictions that prevent her from living normally and fears that force her to Permanently surrendering and sacrificing without finding appreciation for all her efforts. On the other hand, this vision is an indication of continuous work, tireless striving, perseverance and peace of mind, marching in many ways to obtain a lawful life and thinking about tomorrow and events and circumstances that are still unknown. Wearing a necklace in a dream With Ibn Sirin’s married wife. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of the earring vision: There is no good in what is made of gold; Because hatred of gold in the interpretation of its color indicates illness, envy, and quarrels. And in pronunciation, it expresses loss, irony, and successive disappointments. He believes that wearing earrings or gold in general is not good for men, but it is not good for women, because it indicates adornment, splendor, freshness, spaciousness of life, a succession of pleasant nights, and the passing of years of prosperity. Prosperity, fertility, and countless blessings. If a married woman sees herself wearing gold, this indicates blessing, prosperity, growth, family ties, the ability to resolve accumulated differences with intuition and intelligence, and the need to slow down before making any decision that negatively affects her. For her later. From another point of view, this vision is an indication of the importance of listening and considering carefully before making any judgment, waiting for every step you take and working to gain experiences and claims from your enemies and friends and not neglecting them. Duties. Seeing gold and silver jewelry is an indication of a son
